name: Hit Color - The most difficult shooting
name_original: Hit Color - The most difficult shooting
description:
Challenge your reaction, fun your time, find the right time, release the arrows, eliminate the rotation of the color ring!
A variety of colors, a variety of speed, a variety of rotation, so that you are deep!

Rules of play:
Arrows and rings continue to rotate, click on the screen, shoot arrows. When the arrow color and the color ring are the same, the color ring blockade is broken. Challenge the limit of self, let your hand speed, the reaction faster and faster!

Game features:
Up to 12 color combinations, colorful
More than five kinds of rotation, test your eyesight
Challenge hand speed and responsiveness
Need to find accurate timing
